summary: Completed frontend testing for 3 new P1 features: 1) Hero height responsiveness - verified correct on mobile (40vh subpages, 60vh homepage) and desktop (55vh subpages, 80vh homepage), 2) Fade-in animations - working with IntersectionObserver and CSS transitions, 3) SEO improvements - html lang='fr', French meta descriptions, dynamic page titles, and descriptive French alt text on images.
passed_tests: Fade-in Animation - Homepage: 3 fade-in-section elements found, 2 became visible on scroll ✅
Fade-in Animation - CSS Transitions: opacity 0.7s ease-out, transform 0.7s ease-out configured ✅
Fade-in Animation - IntersectionObserver adds 'is-visible' class correctly ✅
SEO - Homepage title: 'Accueil | Paroisse Notre Dame d'Autan' ✅
SEO - Page titles: All tested pages have correct format 'PageName | Paroisse Notre Dame d'Autan' ✅
SEO - Meta description: French content about parish ✅
SEO - Homepage hero alt: 'Vue de l'église de Castanet-Tolosan, paroisse Notre Dame d'Autan' ✅
SEO - Subpage hero alt: Descriptive French alt text on all tested pages ✅
Navigation - All 8 tested pages load successfully ✅
Navigation - Mobile hamburger menu opens correctly ✅
Navigation - Hero CTA buttons ('Nous contacter', 'Je suis nouveau') navigate correctly ✅
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 P1 features verified working: 1) Responsive hero heights use Tailwind classes h-[40vh] sm:h-[55vh] for subpages and min-h-[60vh] sm:min-h-[80vh] for homepage, 2) FadeIn component in /src/components/FadeIn.js uses custom hook /src/hooks/useFadeIn.js with IntersectionObserver (threshold 0.12), adds 'is-visible' class, CSS in index.css has 0.7s transitions, 3) SEO handled by /src/components/SEO.js that sets document.title and meta tags, index.html has lang='fr' and default meta description. Site is fully functional French parish website.
